name: Downlight - Demo
description:
In Downlight you will face alien and mutated creatures in the depth of the earth. 

Your only weapon will be a flashlight that is able to shoot both a ray of light and a ray of darkness. 

You will need to discover how different creatures react to these lights and use your cunning to survive towards the final boss!

This is the Demo for Downlight, made for the GreenLight Jam 2022

This demo is missing all the story elements, visual upgrades and is roughly one third of the length of the final project, but it shows the core of the game, from the beginning to the final boss.

It has been made from scratch in one month, from learning how to code in 2D to the actual finished demo. 

If you like it, leave a comment and consider offering a small donation, so that we can sprint into a proper full fledged game!

Have fun!
